paper_abstract: Previous approaches to question retrieval in community-based question answering rely on statistical translation techniques to match users' questions (queries) against collections of previously asked questions. This paper presents a simple but effective method for computing word relatedness to improve question retrieval based on word co-occurrence information directly extracted from question and answer archives. Experimental results show that the proposed approach significantly outperforms translation-based approaches.
paper_title: Computing Word Semantic Relatedness for Question Retrieval in Community Question Answering
